name: The capricious journey
description:
The capricious journey is a game made during Castle game jam 2018.

In the game you play as a ball against cubes. Destroy spawners to complete a stage. After all stages are complete, you complete the level. Completing the time attack mode unlocks the custom mode, in which you can change levels, speed, difficulty and other settings.

Game made by: Martin Váňa, Henri Sarasvirta, Till Isenhuth, Mikko Aaltio, Elie Abraham.
